name: Look over the Edge
description:
Meet the game "Look over the Edge"
It's an original, innovative, polished 3D puzzle game with a lots of hand-crafting levels.

Your main target is to find a way home. It sounds simply but in fact you'll discover it's really hard because you have to play and solve level puzzles in a full 3D world with many elements which ones of them help you get home and other not.

Features:
+ Unique mix gameplay: simple one-touch control and hard-thinking riddles
+ Endless smart fun
+ Over 60 hand-crafting 3D levels
+ Ambient music (better play with headphones)
+ New levels and elements coming soon
+ Compete with your family and friends. The players told us that they played "Look over the Edge" together with the family and friends

Don't forget! Open your mind and use your all imagination during playing the game!

We are constantly working hard on making the “Look over the Edge” game better and better. We need your constant support to get going. Please feel free to email us for any queries/suggestions/problems or if you just want to say hello.

For more puzzle games, information or support, please visit www.qaibo.com
